description: The pilot reports on the downwind leg with the intention of flying an initial approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, downwind for initial.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report base.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you base, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on the downwind leg with the intention of performing a low go.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, downwind for low go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report base.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you base, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on the downwind leg with the intention of performing a touch and go.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, downwind for touch and go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report base.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you base, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on the downwind leg with the intention of a full-stop landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, downwind for full stop.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report base.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you base, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning onto the base leg for a low go.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, base for low go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down, report final for Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Gears are green, call you final for Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning onto the base leg for a touch and go.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, base for touch and go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down, report final for Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Gears are green, call you final for Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning onto the base leg for a full stop landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, base for full stop.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down, report final for Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Gears are green, call you final for Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on the initial leg and is instructed to report downwind.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, initial.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report downwind.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you downwind, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a full stop landing and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for full stop.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, surface wind 210 at 08 knots, cleared to land Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: s/w copied, cleared to land Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a touch & go and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for touch and go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, surface wind 210 at 08 knots, cleared for touch and go Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: s/w copied, cleared for touch and go Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a low go and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for low go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, surface wind 210 at 08 knots, cleared for low go Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: s/w copied, cleared for low go Runway 16, {Call Sign}.
